enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: REASON: Pre-registration is not allowed for this class. Please try again during regular registration.
title: JOUR JOUR 413-0-20 TV News Producing and Performance

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course is designed to give students producing, interviewing and anchoring experience. You will learn how to "line produce" a traditional newscast using the type of software that television newsrooms use. In addition, you will get in-depth interviewing experience in the context of field and public affairs show producing.

subject: JOUR
